Message.Title: Parallel Corpora Hub for (Spoken-Sign) Machine Translation
Message.DescriptionPart1: Gloss Loader is an online tool meant to support crowd sourcing contributions to gather parallel corpora for machine translation.Although the platform is open for any language pairs, it was originally developed aiming to retrieve parallel corpora for spoken-sign language pairs. In such cases, sign language gloss in the same spoken language is used to translate sign-spoken language pairs.
Message.DescriptionPart2: The platform can be used to provide the translation in a given language to the sentences already available in the database or to input the same sentence translated in two or more different languages. Gloss Loader can be used anonymously or by registered users. The database identifier of registered users is stored together with their contributions just for statistical purposes in order to be able to assign a trustworthy indicator to their translations/contributions which will be critical for machine translation.

Message.NotPossibleRemoveLanguageProficiency: It is not possible to remove the language proficiency. You have already made contributions to this language.
